snippet: Lara Gut, a 24-year-old Swiss, needs just 6 more points to earn the crystal globe trophy awarded to the best all-around skier.
abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; Lara Gut places fifth in super-G in Lenzerheide, Switzerland, putting her on track to win crystal globe trophy awarded to best all-around Alpine skier; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lara Gut, a 24-year-old Swiss, needs just 6 more points to earn the crystal globe trophy awarded to the best all-around skier.

headline.main: Gut Closes In on Women’s World Cup Overall Title
headline.print_headline: Gut Closes In on Women’s World Cup Overall Title
